channel.title: sillygwailo tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from sillygwailo.

item.description: I can’t believe I live in Toronto. https://t.co/n6cr2Ltfgx
item.source:markdown: I can’t believe I live in Toronto. https://t.co/n6cr2Ltfgx

item.description:
I miss the San Francisco–Oakland Bay Bridge and all views of it. https://t.co/auOBDehSs8

I call it by its full name even when I’m not mad at it.
item.source:markdown:
I miss the San Francisco–Oakland Bay Bridge and all views of it. https://t.co/auOBDehSs8
I call it by its full name even when I’m not mad at it.

item.description: “No, really, is this a joke?” https://t.co/VRSJllKcID
item.source:markdown: “No, really, is this a joke?” https://t.co/VRSJllKcID

item.description:
A dude remarked remarked on my DJ Shadow shirt at the grocery store just now. We had a conversation about it.

It’s only ever been dudes. I’d wonder if there were any women DJ Shadow fans if I didn’t know the reason why women don’t remark on what I wear.
item.source:markdown:
A dude remarked remarked on my DJ Shadow shirt at the grocery store just now. We had a conversation about it.
It’s only ever been dudes. I’d wonder if there were any women DJ Shadow fans if I didn’t know the reason why women don’t remark on what I wear.

item.description: @JomboyMedia The Blue Jays feed caught Gary Sánchez saying something to Lourdes Gurriel Jr. afterwards Hmm, maybe in Spanish? I wonder what that was.

item.description: @Sportsnet We’re gonna need a @JomboyMedia breakdown for this one. The away feed caught Gary Sánchez saying something to Lourdes Gurriel Jr. Hmm, maybe in Spanish? I want some expert lip-reading on that, too.

item.description: “Now, they say it’s because of ‘a disease that we can get even if vaccinated, which shreds our lungs and causes permanent brain damage, that we’ll get over and over until it ultimately kills us.’” https://t.co/ud5lpzg4E6 https://t.co/gYWhBAbcmd
item.source:markdown: “Now, they say it’s because of ‘a disease that we can get even if vaccinated, which shreds our lungs and causes permanent brain damage, that we’ll get over and over until it ultimately kills us.’” https://t.co/ud5lpzg4E6 https://t.co/gYWhBAbcmd

item.description:
This video is 8 years old, and already the Toronto streetscape in it looks dated. https://t.co/pxEnwanCx2

Zimmerman says they’re going to take Richmond at the outset, but he meant Adelaide. At one point, they roll by the park near where I live currently.

Even what they talk about, especially near the end, didn’t age well: A Canadian celebrity they mention would become disgraced only a few months later.
item.source:markdown:
This video is 8 years old, and already the Toronto streetscape in it looks dated. https://t.co/pxEnwanCx2
Zimmerman says they’re going to take Richmond at the outset, but he meant Adelaide. At one point, they roll by the park near where I live currently.
Even what they talk about, especially near the end, didn’t age well: A Canadian celebrity they mention would become disgraced only a few months later.

item.description: I’m tying a knot in this thread. The emergency phase of the pandemic is over, and none of my crushes talk to me, so I’m going to mute (and, over time, unfollow) them so that they don’t come to mind so often.
item.source:markdown: I’m tying a knot in this thread. The emergency phase of the pandemic is over, and none of my crushes talk to me, so I’m going to mute (and, over time, unfollow) them so that they don’t come to mind so often.

item.description: The thought occurred to me that this might be the last winter I spend in Toronto.
item.source:markdown: The thought occurred to me that this might be the last winter I spend in Toronto.

item.description:
Good article, though it doesn’t mention speech therapy. It’s expensive, but it can work (I’m proof of that). https://t.co/80mxMhV9l7

“The 2017 World Series MVP doesn’t have a trigger for his stutter, though he knows when it’s about to happen and can modify his speech to work around it.”

That rings true. I know some of my triggers, and warming up my voice and remembering to breathe before talking helps a lot.
item.source:markdown:
Good article, though it doesn’t mention speech therapy. It’s expensive, but it can work (I’m proof of that). https://t.co/80mxMhV9l7
“The 2017 World Series MVP doesn’t have a trigger for his stutter, though he knows when it’s about to happen and can modify his speech to work around it.”
That rings true. I know some of my triggers, and warming up my voice and remembering to breathe before talking helps a lot.

item.description: A year ago today. https://t.co/0OK8LUfK23
item.source:markdown: A year ago today. https://t.co/0OK8LUfK23

item.description:
It was funny when, during the initial meetup for divorced male gamers in Toronto, the organizer had to excuse himself because his ex-wife was calling him.

Whenever Frank Ocean’s “Nights” comes on the playlist, I think of that guy when he sings 🎶 “Hope you’re doing well, bruh.” 🎶
item.source:markdown:
It was funny when, during the initial meetup for divorced male gamers in Toronto, the organizer had to excuse himself because his ex-wife was calling him.
Whenever Frank Ocean’s “Nights” comes on the playlist, I think of that guy when he sings 🎶 “Hope you’re doing well, bruh.” 🎶

item.description:
Extremely short videos are way better than static photos. So much more interesting. https://t.co/2QTeslytWu

“I mean, photopgraphy is all right if you don’t mind looking at the word from the point of view of a paralyzed Cyclops—for a split second. But that’s not what it’s like to live in the world.” https://t.co/WBAg2598tG
item.source:markdown:
Extremely short videos are way better than static photos. So much more interesting. https://t.co/2QTeslytWu
“I mean, photopgraphy is all right if you don’t mind looking at the word from the point of view of a paralyzed Cyclops—for a split second. But that’s not what it’s like to live in the world.” https://t.co/WBAg2598tG

item.description: This is the thunderstorm that we paid our property taxes for. #dlws
item.source:markdown: This is the thunderstorm that we paid our property taxes for. #dlws

item.description:
I enjoyed this podcast from @TalkingDrupal about the Book Module. It’s one of my favourite modules, and I use it extensively on my Drupal 7 site. It should probably be called the Outline module, since you can then use Drupal as a content outliner. #drupal https://t.co/Iklbp4tWeG

Turning content into a “book” may have been the module’s original function, but the outline part of it service a more general purpose.

They talk about an outline not being able to have more than one parent, but I do recall it being possible by adding a reference in the database, even if there’s no UI for it (maybe not in the post-Drupal 8 incarnation of the software, but definitely in a previous version).
item.source:markdown:
I enjoyed this podcast from @TalkingDrupal about the Book Module. It’s one of my favourite modules, and I use it extensively on my Drupal 7 site. It should probably be called the Outline module, since you can then use Drupal as a content outliner. #drupal https://t.co/Iklbp4tWeG
Turning content into a “book” may have been the module’s original function, but the outline part of it service a more general purpose.
They talk about an outline not being able to have more than one parent, but I do recall it being possible by adding a reference in the database, even if there’s no UI for it (maybe not in the post-Drupal 8 incarnation of the software, but definitely in a previous version).
